snippet: Over the years, Janet L. Yellen has occasionally been asked about being a female economist, providing a bit of insight into how she has viewed her rise in a male-dominated field.
abstract: Janet L Yellen, nominated by Pres Obama to become chairman of Federal Reserve, has occasionally been asked over the years about being a female economist, providing a bit of insight into how she has viewed her rise in a male-dominated field; examples of Yellen's comments.
lead_paragraph: Over the years, Janet L. Yellen has occasionally been asked about being a female economist, providing a bit of insight into how she has viewed her rise in a male-dominated field.

headline.main: And Now, From the Woman Poised to Run the Fed ...
headline.print_headline: And Now, From the Woman Poised to Run the Fed ...
